item.title: Runescape Money Orb
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Im adding this client sided

if(coinToggle){ int cash; String Cash = RSInterface.interfaceCache[8135].disabledMessage; cash = Integer.parseInt(Cash); coinPart.drawSprite(400+11+32, 87); smallText.method382(getMoneyOrbColor(cash), 485, RSInterface.interfaceCache[8134].disabledMessage+"", 102, true); }

and my client crashes when i click the orb.

this is crash error

Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.NumberFormatException: null at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.method146(client.java:12935) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9065) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9781) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5419) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
